name: Persona Template for FigJam
description:
What's that?

An extremely easy to use template for creating a persona (or a proto-persona) that will help you solve real problems.


Combining a regular persona without any excessive fluff (like shoe size and music taste) with a value proposition canvas. It just works.


Workshops?

Sure, you can go with this scenario:

  1. Insert basic personal info (name, role, age) together.
  2. Set a timer and let everyone add their ideas for the first row (Daily responsibilities).
  3. After that set another timer for a voting session. Ask people to put two (or more if it's a larger group) stickers on the cards that seem to be the most relevant.
  4. Sort cards with most votes.
  5. Repeat for every section.
  6. You can remove cards without any votes. Just do whatever you need to move this forward. You're going to be okay.
